Title: Luther Braxton (No. 21): Conclusion
Writer: Jon Bokenkamp (created by), Michael Ostrowski (teleplay by), Jim Campolongo (teleplay by), Kristen Reidel (story by), Vincent Angell (story by), Amanda Kate Shuman (executive story editor), Brandon Margolis (story editor), Brandon Sonnier (story editor)
Actors: James Spader, Megan Boone, Diego Klattenhoff, Ryan Eggold
Plot: FBI boss Cooper tries to rescue his team in the wake of chaos at a detention facility. Elsewhere, thief Luther Braxton attempts to attain confidential information.
